Articles.Content: ![IHB7ND3.png](http://i.imgur.com/IHB7ND3.png)Im using this rocket and its not slowing down, not heating up or blowing up, F12 shows no aero indicators and parachutes dont work, did the atmosphere disappear?

It's a known issue with FAR Ferri. Unfortunately, what's not known is the cause of it. So far, information and reproduction steps are nothing more than 'I launched a few rockets and it broke'.

If you could nail down solid reproduction steps, [as outlined in this sticky](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229-How-To-Get-Support-%28READ-FIRST%29), ferram4 has an [issue on Github you can contribute to](https://github.com/ferram4/Ferram-Aerospace-Research/issues/83).
